item.title: Not the bees! Not the bees! Neonicotinoid ban comes with a sting
item.author: Laura Kor,
item.description: The European Union has voted in favour of a ban on neonicotinoids, the most widely used pesticide in the world. However, with fierce behind-the-scenes campaigns and passionate lobbying from all parties involved, this result was by no means easily decided. So why have neonicotinoids been banned? How â€¦
